subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Last May, Dale Earnhardt Jr. gave up on his bid to take control of Dale Earnhardt Inc., the race team started by his late father and now run by his stepmother, Teresa Earnhardt.
snippet: Last May, Dale Earnhardt Jr. gave up on his bid to take control of Dale Earnhardt Inc., the race team started by his late father and now run by his stepmother, Teresa Earnhardt.
